landing.title: Help End Animal Suffering

charityIntro.title: Stop wasting tabs, start changing the world
charityIntro.subTitle: Every animal deserves a life free from suffering. With Tab for Ending Animal Suffering, you can help end the abuse of animals on factory farms all by opening browser tabs. It's free, easy, and supports animals in need.

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the corner of your new tab page. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It's completely free!

questions.question: What nonprofit does Tab for Animals support?
questions.answer: Tab for Ending Animal Suffering partners with [The Humane League](https://thehumaneleague.org/)—champions for animals trapped on factory farms. In 2024 alone, their campaigns impacted 86 million hens around the world, driving large-scale change for animals on factory farms. The Humane League works through corporate negotiations, legislative advocacy, and coalition building to create lasting change for animals worldwide. The Humane League's evidence-based approach has made them a top-rated animal protection charity for over a decade. Join us in backing real progress for chickens, pigs, and cows—one tab at a time.
